Package Controller.Account.Password

Class PasswordController

java.lang.Object
Controller.Account.Password.PasswordController
public class PasswordController extends Object
This class manages functions related to passwords and login credentials.
Author:
Christian Asher, Saffron Lim

    static int

  • Method Details

    • checkCredentials

      public static int checkCredentials(Entity.User.EmployeeType empType, String inputPassw, String inputUserID)
      This function checks the login credentials of the user such as whether information like the EmployeeType, userID, and password corresponds to data stored in the EmployeeRepo.
      Parameters:
      empType - EmployeeType (STAFF, ADMIN, MANAGER).
      inputPassw - String representing the user's password.
      inputUserID - String representing the user's userID.
      Returns:
      int with a value of -1, 0, or 1 (-1: User does not exist, 0: password entered is wrong, 1: login is successful).

    • changePassword

      public static void changePassword(Entity.User.EmployeeType employeeType, String userID, String branch)
      Allows the user to change their password.
      Parameters:
      employeeType - User's EmployeeType (enum)
      userID - User's login ID (String)
      branch - User's branch (String)
